name: Xiangling
title: Exquisite Delicacy
intro: A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

normalAttack.title: Dough-Fu
normalAttack.info:
Normal Attack

Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes.

Charged Attack

Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.

Plunging Attack

Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skill.title: Guoba Attack
skill.info: Summons Guoba the Panda. After 2 seconds, Guoba starts breathing fire at an opponent, dealing AoE Pyro DMG every 1.5 seconds 4 times.

burst.title: Pyronado
burst.info: Displaying her mastery over both fire and polearms, Xiangling sends a Pyronado whirling around her. The Pyronado will move with your character for so long as the ability persists, dealing Pyro DMG to all opponents in its path.

passiveTalents.title: Crossfire
passiveTalents.info: Increases the flame range of Guoba by 20%.

passiveTalents.title: Beware, It's Super Hot!
passiveTalents.info: When Guoba Attack's effects end, Guoba leaves a chili pepper on the spot where it disappeared. Picking up a chili pepper increases ATK by 10% for 10s.

passiveTalents.title: Chef de Cuisine
passiveTalents.info: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on an ATK-boosting dish, Xiangling has a 12% chance to receive double the product.
